content: *single_crochet in next 3 stitches increase repeat from * around 30 round 17-18 single_crochet in each stitch around 30 round 19 *single_crochet in next 4 stitches increase repeat from * around 36 round 20 *single_crochet in next 4 stitches decrease repeat from * around 30 round 21 *single_crochet in next 3 stitches decrease repeat from * around 24 round 22 *single_crochet in next 2 stitches decrease repeat from * around 18 round 23 *single_crochet in next stitch decrease repeat from * around 12 stuff body after round 23 round 24 decrease around 6 fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing use tail to sew closed f ront feet make 2 round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 round 2 increase in each stitch 12 round 3 *single_crochet in next stitch increase repeat from * around 18 round 4 single_crochet in each stitch around 18 round 5 decrease around 9 round 6-9 single_crochet in each stitch around 9 fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing stuff foot and sew to body © emily miller 2008 http //emporium etsy com 2 do not copy reproduce sell or share pattern without permission b ack feet make 2 round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 round 2 increase in each stitch 12 round 3 *single_crochet in next stitch increase repeat from * around 18 round 4 single_crochet in each stitch around 18 round 5 decrease around 9 round 6-8 single_crochet in each stitch around 9 fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing stuff foot and sew to body e ars make 2 round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing sew to head at round 7 tail round 1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 4 round 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 4 fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing sew to backside of body using black embroider inverted triangle over round 1 of head for nose © emily miller 2008 http //emporium etsy com 3 do not copy reproduce sell or share pattern without permission
